title: imgiu
author: imgiu
content: Imgiu.com is an image hosting platform that offers free and unlimited storage for your images. With a focus on privacy and security, Imgiu allows users to quickly and easily upload and share images. No registration is required, ensuring user confidentiality and image protection.https://youtu.be/fAousQf5W1IFree Unlimited StorageOffers free and unlimited storage space for your images. No need to worry about space limitations.Fast Upload SpeedImgiu excels in fast upload speeds, enabling users to efficiently upload images without unnecessary delays.Easy SharingWith Imgiu, sharing images is straightforward. It provides direct links to your images for easy sharing with friends, on social media, or on websites.Privacy and SecurityImgiu safeguards user privacy by offering an anonymous service without requiring any registration. Your images are kept safe and secure.https://imgiu.com/

comments.body: You have a big competitor, so it's not going to be easy TalkImg.com - Image hosting for BitcoinTalk. comments.author: Husires
comments.body: website template reminds me of ChipMixer, they are very similar.QuoteImgiu prioritizes the privacy and security of your images. No personal information is collected, and the images are stored securely. Additionally, you can control who can access your images. How can I control who accesses my photos? I have not found a setting that supports this.I do not find that you accept Tor or that the site can work without JavaScript, so how do you focus on privacy?There is no option to paste images or upload images via CTRL+VThe only advantage is the ability to delete imgs.
